text: Joe and Jack is a Canadian/Irish/British/American children's television series airing on Qubo in the United States, and Tiny Pop in the United Kingdom. The series follows a 4-year-old Irish boy named Joe, and his best friend, a blue cat named Jack. Together, they go on adventures using their imaginations. == Characters == * Joe 4-year old boy. * Jack (Voiced by Paul Tylak) Joe's blue cat and best friend * Lizzie Joe and Jack's friend * Tallulah Lizzie's purple dog * Gracie Joe's baby sister == Episodes == {|class="wikitable" |- !
